name: Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc
description: Install the game without changing the default installation folder

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Rayman 3, don't change default settings.

content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Ubisoft/Rayman 3/Rayman3.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating WINE prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    requires: Rayman3.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Rayman 3, don't change default settings.
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1024x768
